00040 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00041 #include "egs_input.h"
00042 
00043 EGS_BaseSimpleSource::EGS_BaseSimpleSource(EGS_Input *input,
00044         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(input,f), q(0), s(0), count(0) {
00045     int Q;
00046     int err = input->getInput("charge",Q);
00047     if (!err) {
00048         q = Q;
00049     }
00050     s = EGS_BaseSpectrum::createSpectrum(input);
00051     if (!s) egsWarning("EGS_BaseSimpleSource::EGS_BaseSimpleSource:\n"
00052                            "    no spectrum was defined\n");
00053 }
00054 
00055 static EGS_LOCAL EGS_TypedObjectFactory<EGS_BaseSource>
00056 source_creator(string("egs++/dso/")+CONFIG_NAME,"EGS_BaseSource");
00057 
00058 EGS_BaseSource *EGS_BaseSource::createSource(EGS_Input *i) {
00059     //EGS_Object *o = source_creator.createSingleObject(i,"createSource",true);
00060     EGS_Object *o = source_creator.createObjects(i,"source definition",
00061                     "source","simulation source","createSource",true);
00062     return dynamic_cast<EGS_BaseSource *>(o);
00063 }
00064 
00065 EGS_BaseSource *EGS_BaseSource::getSource(const string &Name) {
00066     EGS_Object *o = source_creator.getObject(Name);
00067     if (!o) {
00068         return 0;
00069     }
00070     EGS_BaseSource *s = dynamic_cast<EGS_BaseSource *>(o);
00071     if (s) {
00072         return s;
00073     }
00074     egsWarning("EGS_BaseSource::getSource(): dynamic cast failed?\n"
00075                "  Object named %s is of type %s. Trying simple cast\n",
00076                Name.c_str(),o->getObjectType().c_str());
00077     return (EGS_BaseSource *)o;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void EGS_BaseSource::addKnownSource(EGS_BaseSource *o) {
00081     if (o) egsInformation("Adding known source of type %s\n",
00082                               o->getObjectType().c_str());
00083     source_creator.addKnownObject(o);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void EGS_BaseSource::addKnownTypeId(const char *tid) {
00087     source_creator.addKnownTypeId(tid);
00088 }
